campaign.story:
The campaign may be over, but you can still get Dreamscaper!
Try out our Alpha Demo!  
Listen to our title track as you read!
Dreamscaper is an ARPG Roguelite blending elements from brawlers, top-down shooters, and dungeon crawlers. 
Every slumber is a different random dungeon and you must unlock the power of your dreams to see a new day.
Play as Cassidy, a young woman trapped in a deep depression. Dive into her subconscious to take on the surreal nightmares she wrestles with. 

We're three game developers that left behind traditional development to make a game that is fun, deeply replayable and has emotional resonance. We find the games we gravitate to the most strike a chord on multiple levels, interconnected in both gameplay and storytelling, and that’s what we plan for Dreamscaper. 

PLATFORMS
As we're a small team, we're focusing our efforts on a PC release first. We're also targeting additional platforms down the road (Nintendo Switch is planned and hopefully PS4, and Xbox One at a later date). With your help, those can be a reality much sooner! 
Adventure through haunting dreams to discover secrets, vanquish nightmares, and upgrade your gear all while uncovering Cassidy’s story.
Battle nightmares and make the rush of permadeath your ally as a multitude of surreal items, and an ever-changing world make Dreamscaper replayable over and over again. 
Live Cassidy's waking life - forge friendships, build relationships and learn more about the world around her to bring new hopes and memories into her next dream.

You'll explore both the waking and dreaming worlds  - your actions in one affect the other.
Waking
 Build Relationships -  Meet the people around Cassidy and empower her with their hopes and memories to dispel the darkness of her nightmares. 
 Unlock Stories -  The further you make it into your dreams, the more you'll learn about Cassidy and her story. Choices you make as the story progresses influence your dreams. 
 Earn Upgrades - Progress in the Dreamscape allows you to forge friendships, unlock new weapons, items and powers that will help you once you fall back asleep.
Dreaming
 Confront Nightmares - Face Cassidy's nightmares to help her see the dawn.
 Explore the Dreamscape - Gear up and build your dream powers as you see more of Cassidy's subconscious.
Dreamscaper features a rich combat system that rewards skilled play. Use careful positioning, exact timing and quick reflexes to defeat foes with an abundance of combat options.  

GET UP CLOSE
Each weapon class in Dreamscaper is unique, from rending the earth below your nightmares to whipping a yo-yo into their faces. You'll have a myriad of options to approach combat.  
Use devastating primary and alternate attacks to dispatch nightmares - send them flying up into the air, careening into a wall, or slam them into the ground. 
Put on some boxing gloves and weave through attacks as you drop her nightmares to the mat
Cassidy grew up on a steady diet of games, action movies, and comic books.
As you explore you'll encounter weaponry (and not-so-weaponry) from her life that's been pulled into the dream.
Cassidy was pretty big into Yo-Yos in middle school

KEEP YOUR DISTANCE
Don't like it up-close and personal? Ranged weapons allow you more freedom to overcome the nightmares.
Blast enemies away with finger guns, fry nightmares with laser eye beams, and rattle skulls with soccer balls. Cassidy has an arsenal to discover in her dreams. 
HARNESS DREAM POWERS
Cassidy uses Frost Fracture to put her nightmares on ice, and with a snap of her finger, shatters them and freezes the playing field
Warp the Dreamscape around you with "Lucid Powers" - surreal dream attacks and abilities that manipulate the elements, warp space, and even control time itself.
Dream Rush - slow time to give yourself the edge
EVADE AND DEFLECT
Cassidy's nightmares are vicious, so you're armed with all the tools to handle them. Shields and footwear allow you to dodge, weave and deflect enemy attacks. 

WAKING
HOME
Cassidy’s apartment is the player’s home base, a reprieve from the intensity of the dreams and a space to dive deeper into the narrative.
As players progress and as Cassidy's character grows, this space evolves with them.
REDHAVEN
Venture through the town Cassidy lives in, Redhaven. You'll find locals to make friends with at bars, parks, gyms and more. 

DREAMING
HOMETOWN
This is where Cassidy grew up, she often dreams of the home she left.
As players learn mechanics, they’ll explore some of Cassidy’s most cherished memories and learn why it meant so much for her to have left it.
CITY
Cassidy's new home. The adjustment for her has been challenging. 
She feels isolated and lost amidst a very different world than she's used to. Her dreams become a reflection and amplification of this.

CAMPGROUND
The calm before the storm.  
This memory of her childhood spent adventuring in the woods with her family lets players look into Cassidy’s world and history before everything is upended as her dreams begin to take on a more nightmarish form.




DISCOVER A HIDDEN WORLD
Explore ever changing Dreamscapes and discover lost memories, surreal scenery and a multitude of unique events, challenges and puzzles.
As you venture through the Dreamscape, you'll find:
Challenge Rooms
Puzzle Rooms
Empowering Shrines
Restorative Ruins
Story Vignettes
Merchants
Challenging bosses

GEAR UP
It's dangerous to go alone.
Dreamscaper features a plethora of weaponry, abilities and items to give you the edge you need to take on Cassidy's nightmares.
Special modifiers and rare items add depth and variety as you plunder through the dreams, allowing you to create unique character builds that encourage strong synergies.
As you make progress in the Dreamscape, you'll earn Sand and Glass to unlock powerful upgrades, new weapons, items and more. 

Discover and do battle with the deadly shades and bosses that invade Cassidy’s dreams, clearing the dark miasma that surrounds her.
Challenging foes will push your skills to the limit as you learn their patterns and unravel the mystery behind their appearance.
Each shade represents a different emotion that Cassidy is struggling with. From anger to anxiety to hopelessness, her feelings take form as deadly nightmares that overrun her once peaceful Dreamscape.
Each boss in Dreamscaper is a representation of one of Cassidy's most negative emotions that she struggles with throughout the game.
Bosses not only have emotion dependent looks, but unique attack patterns that are also fashioned after these feelings.
Insidious and cunning, Isolation exists between dreamspaces, waiting for the moment that Cassidy can be totally separated from all that comforts her
PLAY

Mysterious, hulking, and inescapable, Fear follows Cassidy through the Dreamscape, dwelling just below the surface, ready to erupt at any moment and overwhelm her

A dark, malevolent force, Loss rips apart her memories in the dream world - “I will take away everything you hold dear”


Play as Cassidy, a quiet, young woman lost in her own daydreams.
She struggles with a move to a new city away from her support network; she feels more lost than ever. Even her dreams have changed.
A chronic underachiever, Cassidy is witty, sardonic, and opinionated with a strong moral compass. A natural introvert, she enjoys time on her own - anything that can take her to another world. Now shiftless and indecisive, Cassidy is dissatisfied with the direction she's heading - a malaise hangs about her life lately and she feels more lost than ever.
She used to love dreaming, escaping to far away lands and fond memories. Now something feels strained - dark thoughts have been invading her sleep. Although concerned and anxious about it, she doesn't know who to reach out to or how to talk about it.
An unexpected tragedy sends her tumbling down a dark hole that she struggles to get out of.
Unravel Cassidy’s story as you plunge through her subconscious, meet people in the real world and discover dream vignettes. 



We would not be able to deliver the experience we wanted players to have without the help of an incredibly talented musician. 
We got Dale North involved very early on in production - as fans of his fantastic work on Wizard of Legend, we're thrilled to be working together to make sure Dreamscaper is as fully-realized as possible. 

DYNAMIC SOUNDTRACK  
All music in the dreams have a duality to them. While exploring, players can expect a more thoughtful, introspective experience - allowing them to fully take in the Dreamscape. 
When confronted by nightmares, the music ratchets up to a pulse-pounding crescendo, complementing the intensity of combat. 

UNREAL BOSS TRACKS
Dreamscaper features killer boss tracks - befitting of the haunting emotions that Cassidy is struggling with. As the bosses are manifestations of Cassidy's mental state, each boss track is inspired by one of Cassidy's own emotions.


AFTERBURNER STUDIOS
Feeling burned out in traditional game development, Rob, Ian, and Paul left it behind in the summer of 2018 to follow their dreams and build an indie title they could call their own. Through this, the idea for Dreamscaper was born; a very personal project, drawing inspiration from childhood favorites and focusing on an emotional through line confronting depression and mental health. Afterburner Studios was then formed in the summer of 2018.
PRESS
https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2019/06/18/dream-diving-roguelite-dreamscaper-enters-open-alpha/ 
https://www.alphabetagamer.com/dreamscaper-alpha-sign-up/ 
https://80.lv/articles/dreamscraper-game-dev-in-ue4-shaders-and-animation/ 
https://www.indiegraze.com/2019/06/19/interview-dreamscaper-dev-team/ 

Because we need you! 
As a team of veteran developers, we are confident we can make a great game. But, in order to make an amazing game as a small, self-funded team, we need feedback, more time, and resources - that's where you come in.
Feedback
Feedback about run speed, animation and certain attack animations lead us to take another pass - we're constantly improving Dreamscaper with the help of everyone who plays it.
We have a small, but dedicated community at the moment, and the feedback they've given us over our year of development has been instrumental in creating an amazing game.
Working with you has been a highlight for us and we plan to continue developing the game in a transparent and collaborative manner.
Scope
We have big ambitions for Dreamscaper - we want to create a game that has the depth and quality for many repeat playthroughs.
Your support will allow us to reach heights that were not possible before. More content, higher quality assets, richer story, deeper mechanics - all of this comes from your help!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Although we know we can deliver a killer title, the exact depth and scope is still uncertain. As a small, self-funded team, the biggest challenge is where we will draw boundaries on the project and how we will constrain ourselves.

Development at this size is always a trade-off between our aspirations and our ability to deliver given time and resources.

The foundation is laid - we've already put almost all major systems in place and have moved on to creating a depth and variety of content.

We're determined we'll release a version of Dreamscaper, but your support will allow us the freedom to create the game that we've been dreaming about.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Big news today Dreamers! 

Dreamscaper is launching into 1.0 on August 12th on Steam, EGS and SWITCH!

updates.update_userinfo: Dreamscaper Spring Update - The Road to 1.0
updates.update_content:
Hey all,

We've been pretty quiet lately, but that means good things, as we're moving rapidly towards our 1.0 release of Dreamscaper. 

Since the Awakening update, we put all our effort into finishing Dreamscaper strong, as we enter the home-stretch of development.

updates.update_userinfo: Rise and Shine with the Awakening Update!
updates.update_content:
Hey backers, 

Wanted to update you all on our most ambitious release to date!

This updates is all about making Dreamscaper a more rewarding game to keep coming back to. We focused heavily on game flow and meta-progression, expanding the Waking World to have more depth and gameplay than before.

We have some big things in the works for our next major update, coming in the new year, but in the meantime, we wanted to celebrate the Winter Holiday season with a small update.

Play Dreamscaper on Steam from the 22nd of December to the 5th of January to check out Cassidy's, limited time, apartment decorations and winter-themed nightmares!

updates.update_userinfo: Take Flight with the Phoenix Update!
updates.update_content: We're thrilled to be able to share our second major content release, "The Phoenix Update," with you!

The last month and a half have been absolutely crazy for Afterburner Studios. Dreamscaper launched into Steam Early Access on August 14th and the response has been incredible: today our review score sits at 92% with over 550 reviews (Very Positive). Thanks to all of you for helping us get this far.
Since then we've been hard at work. We released a Balance Update, a Quality of Life Update and an Engine Upgrade. Today we've released our first Major Content Update: The Reflection Update.

campaign.story:
ALTER TITAN is the game that combines fitness and mobile gaming  
How Does it Work?
 You play a full-fledged RPG game on your mobile phone but with one nuance: in order for your character to grow, you need to train in real life.
The main goal of the game is to motivate you to exercise while playing as your character: the Titan.
 The stronger you get in real life, the better your titan! 
The benefit is seeing growth reflected immediately in your Titan. Your Alter Titan will shrink or bulk up based on your exercise consistency.
No matter what kind of exercises or sports you do... 
 Just sync up your wearable and get gains... 
 With our flexible import system, you can bring in workouts from popular apps as long as there is heart rate reading and real-time workout tracking.  Import workouts from your heart rate wearable or choose the live-sync option for popular wearables. 
 What awaits you in the game? 
PLAY


 Multiplayer and Team Experience
FIGHT TOGETHER
 Gameplay Missions
Embark on riveting missions and fight against enemies who pose a threat to your mission.  
Specialize your Titan in a class in order to help your squad out. Joining forces with friends is a sure way to defeat strong enemies, exercise cooperatively and become healthier together.
 Classes: Scout? Medic? or Vanguard? Decisions, Decisions...
3 FACTIONS! PICK ONE
Choose your Faction carefully: each faction features unique starter pets and ideologies.
Don't mind waiting until full release? Get recruit status. (Recruits' Estimated delivery and Full Release: June 2021)



 Can't wait to play the Beta? Grab a Simple Crate! (Crate Estimated delivery July 2020) 
 T-Shirt Add On ($15) Already Included in Some Crates
 A 300,000 passenger ship that's embarked on a mission to secure our second home    
Really can't wait and need Alpha + Beta Access? Grab a Early Bird Crate. Estimated early bird crate delivery (June 2020)
Introducing the Cadet Crate: a starter package issued to all Titan Cadets who signed up for Project Second Earth. Motivated by the desire to serve humanity, these volunteers come from a wide background of university graduates and working class individuals who sought a higher cause to live for.

                                           Each Cadet Crate comes in three colors honoring the three Titan Factions. Get ready to pick reserve yours.

                                           Do you have what it takes to be a Cadet? 
Introducing the Zealot Crate: a starter package issued to all Titan Cadets who hail from the Zealot foundation.  Zealots were once renowned scientists and researchers who advanced DNA bio-engineering to where it is today. 
Most of the founding Zealots and its followers have died during the first invasion. Now only a small population rides aboard the G.C.S.S., and is comprised of young Cadets who are unfamiliar with their Zealot lineage.

                                           Each Zealot Crate comes in three colors honoring the three Titan Factions. Get ready to pick reserve yours.

                                           Do you have what it takes to be a Zealot?

 Introducing the Interrogator Crate: a starter package issued to all Titan Cadets who hail from the Interrogator Council. Interrogators were once powerful aristocrats who held great influence over Old Earth's decision makers and sat on the council for The Four.
Most of the Interrogators vanished before the First Invasion had long began. The Interrogators who remain are young Cadets who are still undergoing their basic training.

                                           Each Interrogator Crate comes in three colors honoring the three Titan Factions. Get ready to pick reserve yours.

                                           Do you have what it takes to be an Interrogator?
What our Exantra World leading players are saying...
" Hitting that "Get Earnings" button and watching my workout push up those XP bars? So satisfying! So now when I'm considering sleeping in and missing a workout, or tired after a shift and thinking about skipping that jog? Big hard nope. I'm going."
 "Collecting DNA Samples, leveling up my Titan, and climbing the leaderboard are just a few incentives that motivate me to work harder/longer. Most importantly, Exantra World is definitely a universe I want to explore and immerse myself in."
 "I'm a major RPG player so getting XP for my workouts has always appealed to me. I also like being able to put points into my character stats. I am looking forward to the unlocking of the remaining features!"

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our greatest challenge is delivering something that you will enjoy and find value in. With that being said, we will try our best to listen to your feedback and keep you involved in Alter Titan's development process. Another challenge can include reward fulfillment. We've learned from the past that software is easier to manage than physical reward items so we've limited the items we need to ship this time. With help from Backerkit.com, we are confident that delivery will go more smoothly. We've given ourselves more time and set a later delivery date in case unexpected delays or setbacks arise. It is better for us to deliver your rewards earlier than later.

Lastly, we're super grateful for Android Titans who have been so patient with us since our last campaign. They took the risk in backing us despite the stretch goal not being met. Now, we would like to honor that by delivering what they have backed and more.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping update 7th July and DnL 2nd Ed information!
updates.update_content:
Afternoon backers! 
We have lots to talk about, so let's start with the shipping update. 
What left is 809 Parcels to the USA and Canada! Shipping restriction by FedEx is still in place for the EU, we know that last week China was re-opened for shipping to the USA so soon the EU should be as well.

Good morning! 
Here is a shipping update, data collected on the 18th of June.
Backers except to the ones based in the US and Canada, that closed their pledges by the 13th of June, should by now received their parcel or shipping notification.

Good morning backers! J here,  I have prepared a detailed shipping roster for you to check out.
We are happy to announce that we have 53 remaining parcels to be shipped to EU backers. All of them are pledges that were recently closed. Shipping is scheduled for Wednesday the 10th of June.
Sixteen remaining parcels for the UK will be shipped by Wednesday the 10th of June.

Dear backers, our Factory Goblins have been toiling away day and night, and now the 1st batch of parcels are on their way to you ; we are preparing packages to go full-steam ahead.
Unfortunately, we have some bad news regarding the following countries:
USA
Canada

This is Lord Bulbo here this time. My beloved Derek The Minion is now very busy with regretting his little rebellion against me.

Baby Tattoo has launched, completed and fulfilled multiple Kickstarter campaigns. While we generally know what we are doing, we have also learned to expect the unexpected. updates.update_content:
Welcome to mid March 2021—one full year after the time we likely would have been wrapping up fulfillment if we had met out original goals.

Although we were aiming (based on our recent sustained weekly throughput) to have all rewards shipped by mid March this year (aka "right now"), we are indeed "wrapping up fulfillment". Amazingly, we've been able to mail more bundles in the past three weeks than during the previous three months—and we have just under 200 packages to go.

,After months of a pedestrian 50 parcel-per-week packing and shipping average, I am genuinely thrilled to announce that we accelerated all the way to a DeLorean-paced 250+ boxes out the door  this week. If we maintain our momentum (which I know we can), all rewards will be shipped by mid-March.

Tracking numbers will continue to be messaged as quickly as we can get boxes out of the building.

Thanks once again, fellow travelers through history, for the timeless patience you've extended.

A project backer recently posted a question in the comments asking how many packages we are shipping per day—resulting in me taking a closer look at the seemingly endless process. I am reposting the answer in this update. I'll post another update at the end of the week announcing exactly how many packages we're able to get into the mail system by Saturday. Hopefully the pace will be picking up...

[simple] Q: "Would you please provide another shipping update? How many are, you shipping each day?"

updates.update_userinfo: “The Day That Holds All Time Together”
updates.update_content:
On this Christmas eve, in this strange year, I’d like to share a very personal update about the progression of the Time Traveling Octopus  fulfillment process.
I normally cloak Baby Tattoo, as a company and its crew, in enigmatic language—the “who”s and “how many”s and the “where”s and “what”s of our inner-workings are kept secret. It’s really just a matter of showmanship—inspired, most likely, by tales of Willy Wonka and his Chocolate Factory, or the Great and Powerful Oz.

As of December 1st—all reward levels have entered the (very time and labor intensive) sorting, packing, and shipping process—oh—and signing! Brian will be hand-signing his name well over 5,000 times across a multitude of books and bonus items before the process is complete! Packages (even the simplest of them) take a minimum of 15 minutes each to assemble! We are buzzing with excitement seeing all of this project's myriad components arranged in nifty bundles for backers of every level—the fulfillment process truly is fulfilling for our little team.

updates.update_userinfo: Phase 1 Shipping Underway / Phase 2 Starts December 1st
updates.update_content: Just a quick report to confirm the timeframes from our previous update. Level 4 rewards (limited edition sets) without add-on collector’s boxes kicked off the first phase of shipping on November 1st. The picking and packing of every reward bundle is being personally supervised by Ringmaster Bob—the process is time-consuming, but more and more packages are prepped every day. Tracking numbers are messaged to individual backers one at a time as their shipments become ready to leave the warehouse. The majority of reward bundles include Time Travel books with Kickstarter exclusive metal corners and/or add-on collector’s boxes, both of which are still en route to our headquarters—these reward packages will go out during the second shipping phase beginning on December 1st. All packages are currentky on target to be fulfulled by the end of December.

Today we are able to definitively confirm, as reported in our previous project update, that the first of two waves of Time Traveling Octopus rewards will begin shipping on November 1st, and the second wave will begin shipping on December 1st. 
With this project finally in its endgame, Baby Tattoo and Brian Kesinger are pleased to announce the launch of a new campaign—literally right this moment. It's not to raise funds for a book, or an art object—it's a live performance—a  musical variety show based on Brian's tale of Buster and the Haunted Banjo.

Our last update's headline contained a bold and simple proclamation...
"The Books Are Finished!"
...turns out—technically true yet ironically false. Keep reading for details of an unexpected* turn of events, or skip to the bottom for a straightforward fulfillment timeline.

updates.update_userinfo: News of the News You've Been Waiting For: The Books Are Finished!
updates.update_content: Photos to come as soon as our single set of samples is couriered to us, but for now—a simple announcement that the books physically exist. They will be trucked to the port for their sea voyage across the Pacific Ocean, then customs clearance and another truck inland to Baby Tattoo Headquarters in Los Angeles. Delivery to backers will begin by November and be concluded before the holidays.

campaign.story:
Run Down #33:  A very kindly thank you to all the backers who stepped in and joined this campaign, bringing Ernie and Luke Gygax's The Lost City of Gaxmoor 5E to the 5th Edition world! For those who may not know, Ernie and Luke are two of Gary Gygax's children and we here at Troll Lord Games have known them and worked with them since our early days back in 2001. This is just another chapter in a long history. A kindly thank you to both the brothers for entrusting this project to Troll Lord Games. And lastly a huge shout and thank you to all the designers who joined the fray en route: Jeffrey P. Talanian James M. Ward Elisa Teague Davis Chenault Bill Webb Alex Kammer Rob Schwalb Joe Manganiello Stephen Radney-MacFarland Satine Phoenix Christopher Clark Turbo Alyssa Faden Stefan Pokorny Joseph Goodman and last but certainly not least Tom Tullis of Fat Dragon Games. And a thank you to CJ Axe (Chris Shurilla) at Axe N Shield and John Popson of Effin Cool Minis for all the support! 
And NOW! The work begins!
NEW, we've added an all digital level to the Kickstarter. This rounds up things from the Kickstarters stretch rewards and puts them in one pledge.  Join the fray! Strengthen your arms. Make Gaxmoor yours!
A quick recap for those looking at the $89 level. Here is what you reap with your pledge: 
$89.00 Pledge Level
The Lost City of Gaxmoor/Map, Hardcover, Full color: Print/PDF 
The Long Valley Adventure: Print 
The Character Reference Sheet Pack
The Lost City of Gaxmoor Map Book: Print/PDF 
Poster of Gaxmoor: Print/PDF 
Isometric Maps of Gaxmoor: Print/PDF 
Fat Dragon Games, 3D Terrain Model for Gaxmoor
Weapons of Gaxmoor: Print/PDF 
Alyssa Faden Map of Gaxmoor Print/PDF 
 The sun sinks slowly over the desolation of the ancient and once grand Empire. In the distance, just upon the slopes of a broad cliff, lie the ruins of a city. Her alabaster walls wind their way along the rocky mesa, guarding buildings both fair and ruined.  It was a great city in its day, now long since fallen to the ravages of time and war. Long ago she stood as a shining doorway to the east, a place for rest and restocking of provisions for those on the long trek into the wild lands of the barbaric frontier in the Western Empire. But all that is past for this, the ruins of the Lost City of Gaxmoor.
ABOUT THE LOST CITY OF GAXMOOR 5E
The Lost City of Gaxmoor 5E is a sandbox adventure we are converting to the 5th Edition of the world's most popular role playing game. Designed for characters that range from 1st to 10th level. It is the brain child of and written by Ernie and Luke Gygax, the sons of the legendary co-creator of Dungeons & Dragons Gary E. Gygax (who also playtested Gaxmoor). If this campaign is successful, The Lost City of Gaxmoor 5E will be released in hardcover format, in a Full Color, 144+ (probably 160, but we won't know until actual layout) page book that includes a fold out map of the city that retails for $49.99 (was $39.99). The PDF with large fold-out map will retailer for $19.99.
The Lost City of Gaxmoor includes the following:
59 Fully Developed Encounter Areas outside the city walls
70 Fully Developed Encounter Areas inside the city walls
The Labyrinth beneath the city proper
70 Magical Statues, Pools and Areas of Interests fully developed for campaign play
an overarching objective for those who desire campaign style play
over a dozen maps of all the relevant areas
NPCs and Areas of Refuge
New Monsters
New Magic Items 
Gaxmoor Map Book: This booklet is designed for the Kickstarter. It will include all the maps of Gaxmoor, extracted from the text, updated for this project, in color and printed on heavy, loose leaf card stock for ease of use. Print & Digital combined will run roughly $20-25.00.
The Lost Valley Adventure Module: The Lost Valley is an adventure set before the gates of Gaxmoor. It serves the GM as a lead in to the City Itself. It will be printed separately from the Gaxmoor book. This book will run roughly $13.00.
The Character Reference Sheets: This are designed in house and sport the Gaxmoor logo! Printed on loose leaf 60lb text paper. 
GAXMOOR, IT CAN BE SO MUCH MORE
If our goal is reached, we hope to add stretch rewards that include the Undercaverns of Gaxmoor, terrain building material from Fat Dragon Games and more. And hopefully, if things go very well, we'll begin adding new encounters areas, statues and NPCs.
 USING THE LOST CITY OF GAXMOOR
The Lost City of Gaxmoor, written by Luke and Ernie Gygax (playtested by the late, great Gary E. Gygax) is a sandbox adventure setting. You can begin adventures in Gaxmoor immediately or if you wish to integrate it into a larger campaign it can be placed almost anywhere. This includes published settings such as the World of Okkorim (created and published Luke Gygax), the World of Aihrde (Troll Lord Games), the Lost Lands (Frog God Games) or Eberron (Wizards of the Coast); or it can be placed in your own world created at your table. It is designed for parties that range in size from 1-18 with only minor adjustments to monsters and encounters.  
GAXMOOR HAS IT ALL
The Lost City of Gaxmoor is a game master's dream. The setting is full to overflowing with adventures, adventure hooks, set ups and more. With almost 200 Areas of Interest and a veritable host of NPCS, as well as factions of monsters at war with each other, the NPCs and soon the characters as well, it offers countless hours of fun. Throw in the machinations of ancient gods and the rise of a demon prince and you suddenly have a campaign setting that just won't quit. Here's a little more of what you'll be getting.
Outside the Wall: Gaxmoor begins with encounters on beyond the city walls. These include Grimhelda the Witch, burned out buildings, Weary Travelers Respite Inn and Stable a swamp, the gates, breaches in the city wall and more. 
The Graveyard: There is a graveyard beyond the walls as well. Hemmed in by hedges and wrought iron fences the graveyard, filled with crypts both small and large, offers mountains of adventure and treasure.
Inside the Wall: Hosts of burned out and ruined buildings, couple with others still occupied and some recently taken over. Here orcs and goblins, gnolls and ogres all vie for power over the bloody streets of this ruined city. From the Grand Theatre to the Home of Bones, the Colosseum to the Public Oratorio, watch towers, homes, The Black Feather Inn...the list goes on.
The Lost City of Gaxmoor offers it all.
There are a few items that are not in the pledge levels or that will be added later as the campaign develops that you may want to add to your pledge. 
The Codex of Aihrde: This massive full color book is the primary source book for one of the most detailed worlds you'll ever encounter. Print $45 | Digital $15 | Print and Digital $55 
5E The Players Guide to Aihrde: The Players Guide includes a mountain of fresh player material for Aihrde as well as the race classes for Dwarf, Elf etc Print $30 | Digital $15 | Print and Digital $40 
5E Mystical Companions: Unmatched in creative content. Mystical Companions opens worlds of familiars, ancestral swords, companions etc for all major classes. Print $35 | Digital $10 | Print and digital $40 
Isometric Maps of Gaxmoor: If you want to get the Isometric maps in digital content, simply add $7.00 to your pledge! When the surveys come around, be sure to list that! 
Extra copy of The Lost City of Gaxmoor 5e: Print 39.99 
Special Leather Collectors Edition: Print $110 (See below for description and video)
22 x 26 inch poster: Digital $3 
Long Valley adventure 5e: Digital $5 
Weapons of Gaxmoor Print $10 | Digital $5 | Print and Digital $11 
Castles & Crusades Players Handbook: Digital $10 
 ABOUT ERNIE AND LUKE GYGAX
Ernie and Luke are the sons of late Gary Gygax, the Father of Role Playing Games. Both learned to play in the earliest days of the game's creation, and at the feet of the game's original creator. Not content with that, both authors have kept up with modern iterations of the game and Luke frequently participates in 5E games, often running them himself. Ernie has continued to write, working toward bringing his own massive dungeons to the playing public. Luke runs one of the most successful conventions on the circuit today, Gary Con. 
 TLG has had the pleasure of working with both Ernie and Luke for many years, as well as their late father Gary Gygax, both in previous publications of Gaxmoor and in the many years at Gary Con! 
ABOUT PLEDGE LEVELS
Creating Content for Gaxmoor: For those interested in adding content to The Lost City of Gaxmoor, we are very excited about welcoming you aboard. You can join the fray by adding street names, NPCs, beverage names or even designing a short encounter. We welcome all creative, interesting out of the box approaches. Entries should be about 500-1,200 words (unless you are just naming something of course) and will be subject to approval from the publisher and Luke and Ernie Gygax. Entries must be in by December 1. This gives us time to read, edit, get back with you and generally prepare the entry for publication. 
The Special Leather Collector's Edition: This book will be designed as are other leathers. It will have dual-color embossed logo, with gold trim, hubs on the spine, a place marker ribbon, as well as your name embossed on the front. You can get a better idea of what the book will look like via this video. It was made a few years ago about a C&C PHB collector's edition, but it will get you a good idea of what you are receiving. 
  Below are expansions to the Amazing Adventures 5E game  we'd love to see come to your table. With your help, we can make them  happen! Follow the map to see what treasures have been unearthed! 
 $9,000: Funded! The Lost City of Gaxmoor Funds!
$11,000: Poster of Gaxmoor: UNLOCKED!  You will receive a 22 x 26 inch poster depicting the town as seen from afar. For $75 levels and above. 
$15,000: The Undercaverns: UNLOCKED!We are going to include the Undercaverns of Gaxmoor by Luke Gygax. Over 20 pages of content that plunges you beneath the sewers of Gaxmoor. This reward will be included in the final book.
$20,000: Isometric Maps of Gaxmoor: Unlocked! You'll receive 9 beautiful isometric maps in your pledge. These originally appeared in the C&C Kickstarter for Gaxmoor, but will be updated and colorized for the The Lost City of Gaxmoor 5E. Print and digital copies of these will be included in all pledge levels $89 and above.
$25,000: Terrain Sets: Unlocked! Fat Dragon Games is providing the following 3D printable terrain stl files as a stretch reward (a $100.00 value!) This package is all the terrain you need to recreate massive Gaxmoor layouts. In addition to these sets, Fat Dragon Games will be creating custom crypt scatter terrain for your layouts! Sarcophagi, coffins, and more! These are included in all pledge levels $45 (all digital) and the $60 and above.
DRAGONLOCK™ ULTIMATE: CAVERNS STARTER SET $19.99
DRAGONLOCK™ ULTIMATE: DUNGEON ITEMS 1 $9.99
DRAGONLOCK™ ULTIMATE: DUNGEON STARTER SET $9.99

$28,000: Veteran Writer: Unlocked! Jeffrey Talanian, owner of Northwind Adventures and writer and designer of the very cool  Astonishing Swordsmen & Sorcerers of Hyperborea RPG, is jumping in. He's agreed to write an encounter area for the Lost City. We'll include it in the final product. What it entails? We cannot say. That's up to Jeff. But keep in mind he worked with Gary Gygax on Castle Zagyg and has created his own Wild Sword & Sorcery game. AND check out his ongoing Kickstarter (as of this writing it is down to three days). This stretch reward goes to all backers.
$31,000: Veteran Writer: Unlocked!Our very own Stephen Chenault, lead designer on Castles & Crusades and creator of the World of Aihrde, and author of such tales as A Houseless God and Other Tales returns to Gaxmoor (he is the author of the above mentioned The Long Valley). He'll take over his own little corner of the Lost City and create an encounter area you won't forget! This stretch reward goes to all backers!
$34,000 Veteran Writer: Unlocked! Our old friend and compatriot plunges into Gaxmoor! James M. Ward, famed for countless RPG titles but perhaps best known for Metamorphis Alpha and the Starship Warden (which will be wandering into the TLG orbit in the near future). Jim will bring his usual burst of creativity to Gaxmoor and design an encounter that will hurl you through time and space!  
 $37,000: Veteran Writer: Unlocked! I spotted Elisa Teague (follow her on Twitter or Facebook), game designer and author, exploring the ruins of Gaxmoor and she too is jumping in. Elisa is probably best known as being a lead designer on Betrayal at House on the Hill: Widow's Walk, Talisman: Kingdom Hearts Edition, the Apocrypha Adventure Card Game, and her Geek Out! line of games, including the upcoming Disney Edition, not to forget her RPG work for D&D, which includes Return to the Ghost Tower of Inverness and the upcoming Wardlings 5e compatible campaign setting! With over 100 titles to her credit, Elisa will pen an encounter or area of interest that cannot help but enrich the decaying streets of our Lost City. We don't know what she will do, but she specializes in riddles, puzzles and the like and most likely tie it her latest foray into mythology (coming soon to DMs Guild).
$40,000: Veteran Writer: Unlocked! Davis Chenault, famed co-creator of the Castles & Crusades Role Playing Game, author of Dens of Iniquity, Assault on Blacktooth Ridge, Death in the Treklant, By Shadow of Night, Beneath the Black Moon and so very much more, has joined the fray! Well known for his detailed NPCs and the brutal world of Inzae, Davis promises another unique encounter in the bloody streets of Gaxmoor!
$43,000: Veteran Writer/Designer: Unlocked! The Lord of Frog God Games, author of countless titles, including the insanely popular Rappan Athuk, Wilderlands of High Fantasy, Dungeon of Graves, and Lost City of Barakus stands at the city gates. Bill, a long time friend of the Troll Lords, brings a very unique -- and extremely dangerous -- approach to encounters. Prepare to be challenged!
$46,000: Veteran Writer: Unlocked! If we hit this level Alex Kammer, owner of Gamehole Con and author of the insanely successful The Sea King's Malice as well as a host of adventures from his own publishing line, joins the hard, cold streets of Gaxmoor! If you've had a chance to game with Alex or play any of his adventures you know whatever encounter area he cooks up will be well worth the price of admission!
$49,000: Veteran Writer: Unlocked! Rob Schwalb joins the wild and mean streets of Gaxmoor. Rob is known for work on some of the most prestigious RPGs on the market: Dungeons & Dragons, Warhammer Fantasy Role and A Song of Fire and Ice Role Play (that last one sounds familiar for some reason. Rob brings his unique vision to Gaxmoor! 
$55,000: Luke Gygax:Unlocked! Luke returns to the Lost City! Luke's going to unearth a favored region of the Lost City and unleash it on your unsuspecting party. Though perhaps best known for establishing and running Gary Con, Luke has also turned his hand to writing adventures for D&D and creating his own world setting: Okkorim. The apple has not fallen far from the tree!
$60,000: Joe Manganiello: Unlocked! The Lost City reaps the creative talents of Joe Manganiello. Not only is Joe an accomplished actor with a host of projects under his belt but he's an accomplished GM, having plunged head first into the world of Dungeons and Dragons back in the 80s, AND he's the owner of DEATH SAVES where he captures the spirit of that Golden Age of role playing! What he'll bring to the lost city is anybody's guess, but we know it will be more than worth the price of admission (see my clever pun there! I'm not very good at puns, but Gary Gygax would be proud of me)! If you aren't familiar with Joe's work, check out his IMDB page. Early work includes True Blood, more recently Rampage (watch this MOVIE, pure awesome) and his most recent release Bottom of the 9th (link for trailer)!
$65,000: Fat Dragon Games returns to Gaxmoor: Unlocked! Fat Dragon Games will create a new 3D printable terrain model for the section of Gaxmoor designed by Joe Manganiello. This downloadable file will be available for those pledge levels $89 and higher. 
$68,000: Stephen MacFarland: Unlocked! Stephen has worked as both an RPG developer and content manager at Wizards of the Coast. From their he went to Paizo and worked on the wildly popular Pathfinder game and now freelances. And if we hit this goal he'll bring all that experience to the Lost City! If you are talking about new and different perspectives, Stephen brings it to the table!
$71,000: Satine Phoenix:Unlocked! Our good friend and DM extraordinaire Satine joins the fray! Satine is founder of Gilding Light, where she helps us all enter the world of storytelling. Satine is accomplished writer (she created her own graphic novel, the New Praetorians) and artist and now co-host to the show Destination Fantastic! Satine will take pen to paper and pen an area of interest for the Lost City!
$75,000: Weapons of the Lost City: Unlocked! Chris Clark joins forces with Turbo to bring you a host of unusual, magical, sometimes both, weapons and armor of the Lost City. This will be a literal treasure trove of material useful in both the Lost City and other 5E games you may be running. Chris Clark has been writing RPGs for decades, owns Inner City Games and was Gary Gygax's long time business partner in Hekaforge.  Turbo, a  partner in Ironwind, Ral Partha, Hyperion Terrain and Monster Fight Club and its Monster Terrain (Kickstarter here) and the ongoing Kickstarter Tentacle Town. Turbo has worked on numerous projects with both Luke Gygax and Chris Clark (Plan B, Revenge of the Fire Giant to name but a few) and is closely involved with the forthcoming Starship Warden by James M. Ward (to be published by Troll Lord Games). Between the two of them they'll break open the armory of Gaxmoor and unleash it on our collective gaming tables!  Pledge levels at the $60+ level receive a digital version of the book. Backers at $89+ receive a print and digital book.
$80,000: Lets revisit Gaxmoor with Alyssa Faden: Unlocked! Alyssa is an extraordinary cartographer who will bring a wholly different perspective to the Lost City! Her attention to detail is through the roof, her ability to bring a region to life is amazing. Check her work out The Cartography of Alyssa Faden! If we hit this reward Alyssa will set about bringing a new vision to Gaxmoor! Alyssa's map will be in addition to the standard fold-out map of Gaxmoor that appears in the back of the book. Pledge levels $60 and above receive a digital copy, $89 and above receive digital and print copy! 
 $83,000: Stefan Pokorny, the Dwarvenaut: Unlocked!The Master of the Dwarven Forge, co-Producer of Destination Fantastic, live streamer, and an amazing artist to boot joins the fray! Stefan is an old school gamer who has remained true to his roots! An Advanced Dungeons and Dragons DM of old, Stefan will bring a tone to Gaxmoor that rings true with the substance of both the Gygax brothers (in particular Ernie, who also plays AD&D!). If you missed what Stefan has been doing these past two decades just follow the Dwarven Road...all the way to his forge.
$86,000: Joe Goodman of Goodman Games: Unlocked! The founder of one of the oldest and most succussful RPG companies and author and creator of Dungeon Crawl Classics RPG (and a long time friend) joins the fray! Joe brings a wealth of experience to the Lost City and a creative mind that is rooted deep in the old world of the fantastic! He'll include an encounter area of area of interest as he desires!
$90,000: World of Aihrde Primer: Unlocked! The world of Aihrde as developed in the Codex of Aihrde, Monsters & Treasure of Aihrde, the Players Guide to Aihrde is a world like no other. Richly developed in history, culture, mythologies, with a fully developed political system. It has everything you've come to expect and more in a fantasy setting. Read more about it here! Find out more here. Everyone who pledges $89+ receives a digital copy of the introductory primer to the world of Aihrde.
$95,000: A Houseless God: Unlocked! The landless knight, Eurich Gunshoff, had no master, but served those in need, sometimes for money, but mostly for the honor of it. He went hungry often, slept in the wilds, endured the rain and snow, the heat and wind. He fought creature great and small. It was a hard life. Of so he thought, until he passed beneath the eaves of the Darkenfold Forest. A collection of four short stories written by Stephen Chenault. Written much like an RPG fantasy game runs, A Houseless God introduces the reader to Eurich, and later, to Ava, a ranger of some repute. A digital copy will be sent to all backers $89 and above.
$100,000: Castles & Crusades Players Handbook: Unlocked! Castles & Crusades is TLG's flagship product. The Players Handbook has been in continuous print since 2005. The seventh printing is the most current version (the game is largely unchanged since the first printing) and is supported by a veritable host of game books: The Castle Keepers Guide, Monsters & Treasure 5th Printing, Adventurers Backpack, Tome of the Unclean to name but a few. It has everything you need to get started in a game of Castles & Crusades, whose easy to learn, malleable attribute check system will allow you to start gaming in minutes. C&C is a fantasy game for the role player in all of us. Everyone who pledges $89+ receives  a digital copy of the C&C Players Handbook 7th printing.
  Note on Shipping: Shipping cost and payment will be  assessed after the Kickstarter is completed.  This will either be via  Kickstarter or BackerKit.  Every attempt is made to keep the shipping  costs down, both in the US and internationally.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Large books such as this one are hard to print and bind and we have to choose our printers with care.

One of the greatest challenges we face is creating such a large book and maintaining the quality of the printing and binding. In order to do this, we must find a printer with the knowledge and capabilities to execute a book of this size and have it look polished and professional, something we take great pride in. This will cost more than usual printing so Kickstarter becomes essential in raising enough capital to give this book the quality it demands and deserves.

We are confident that with a successful Kickstarter we can bring this product to the world not only as a great resource, but also as a great looking book.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

All the Resin Dice
Starting with the first 5 iconic elements this is a 26 dice series that is both in metal and glitter resin dice.
All the prices are in Canadian Dollars. The backer kit will have paypal as an option to pay.
All Dice are actual sample pictures - No Renders!
Because of the nature of dice there can be some variation, the layers might not be as evenly dispersed, or the enamel paint blends in different unique ways.

 The Story so far
 Moonie, the Dragon of the Moon, sits beside you at the tavern and says "Let me tell you a story about a Dragon I once met atop the highest mountain; his name is Zen, and he is a tiny Dragon, the size of a kitten really. He told me that he was so in tune with the Elements that he had shrunk down and his features changed to the epitome of those elements." 
She hands you a picture book, "These are some of the most iconic elemental forces he found in nature and how they can be held in your hands."
Air Elemental
While I was sitting in my nest a gust of wind rushed through my antlers. It tickled me as it played and danced around me. I was so curious that I focused my keen dragon senses and I saw her. She was a wee elemental who had wild hair that danced around her face. She wore a light blue dress and her skin was a sweet pink. We spoke long into the days and I came to realise that Air is the most difficult to describe. She is everywhere, however when she leaves us we are gasping for her and when to much air is near we cannot handle her. The scents she brought with her were divine.  To help humans sense her I have created these rocks that capture a small portion of her essence.  I have many more stories and elements I have met along the way, hopefully we will meet many more together.
Fire Elemental
I once flew into a fire; its light was dancing and vigorous. Such a voracious appetite, consuming everything in its way; then I saw him, a slender elemental, he had bits of wood he was shoving quickly into his mouth. Delight filled his features as he ate everything, he quickly looked at me as if I was food and I had to back away as fast as I could. He was so dangerous, everything was something that could be consumed, but the heat made my nights safer from the other creatures. 
Earth Elemental
When I was a larger dragon I would spend a lot of time walking along the beaches pondering the vision of land and sea. I could hear a roaring in the distance, I ran thinking a dragon was in trouble and a curious sight was laid out before me. A huge fellow of a man was roaring at the waves every time they came on to land, when it receded he would quiet, and sure enough roar again. I stood beside him shouting my displeasure as well more for company than true anger. 
Water Elemental
After I had tired myself out I saw a woman standing in the waves, she was covered in foam from the sea and had star fish in her hair. She said not a word but would wave her hand to make huge waves. She dove beneath the surface and I followed. To my surprise I learned of an entire world under the waves, filled with life. I watched the sea for a while, sometimes it raged and destroyed the earth, and other times it was peaceful. Always I remembered that its waves are filled with life. 
Ether (Space) Elemental
As I lay upon a sea island and floating with the waves the sky above me was filled with such vivid wonder. Stars shot across the sky and I noticed massive eyes watching me. They were made up of the stars and I felt a shiver go down my tail. This huge elemental creature was enveloping the world I lay upon. I haven't found the courage to go into the unknown, but maybe one day.

Add-ons
All our Add-on’s, Shipping, Extra Dice Orders, are going to be processed through BackerKit; once the Kickstarter closes you will receive an email to make any selections you want to add on and to pay for shipping.
Neat things about backerkit!
1 - you can pay via paypal
2 - if financial trouble comes up you can keep your kickstarter pledge, let it fail and then if by the time shipping comes around your life has gotten better you can get the dice then.
3 - it is an easy succinct system for add ons, updating address, and mass information. 
 Dice Trays
For $15 CAD (roughly $12 USD) you will get a custom dice tray with Zen in the middle!
It will be a stylish black leather exterior and the Interior will have a felt, with the option of being in Pink, Green, or Purple.
Purple, Green, Pink, & Backview
 Commemorative D6
For $3 CAD a die you can order as many of the commemorative D6's you could want! The 6 will be replaced with Zen. 
Commemorative D6
 Wooden Dice Tray
The wooden dice tray can be engraved with either Moonie or Zen. They will be made of Rosewood. The cost is 35 CAD per unit which is approximately 26.50 USD.
Rosewood Dice Tray
 Light up Dragon Base (Limited Quantity)
These are cute light up dragon bases which run on watch batteries. I have a limited stock but they will make your dice look that much more amazing. The cost is 18 CAD per unit which is approximately 14 USD.
Light up Dragon Claw Base
What about your past campaigns products?
If possible I will be putting products on as limited, these includes
Hidden Gem Dice
Birthday Gem Dice
Commemorative Dice/Coins
Shipping 
We are working with a fulfilment company in China called Cerberus, he is native to the UK and has a lot of experience with shipping worldwide. 
All of our international shipping will be handled by Ceberus, this is the most economical way to ship your products and save you money for dice!
This is the cheapest option I can provide for Canadian/American Customers by shipping it myself.
This is our third Kickstarter, our first one we shipped everything out within 4 months from start to finish of the Kickstarter. Our Second one was also shipped out ahead of schedule within 5 months, we tripled the amount of backers but kept our commitment to making sure you get your dice as soon as possible.
However our estimated Shipping Date is August 2020. It's always possible that there will be manufacturing delays but we will pass along any updates good or bad as we travel along this together.
Late Backers & Pledge Changes
Please try to keep all pledges within the Kickstarter. Add ons will be possible through the backer kit and small modifications may be possible but will delay your shipment.
Quality Control
The Factory will be doing a rigorous check to make sure the dice are polished to the correct standards, as well the Cerberus team will be completing a secondary quality check on all of the orders going out.
 After the Project
First and Foremost - making your dice/trays/bags and shipping it to you.
Anything leftover:
We will be opening our flagship store in Ontario, that’s right a Brick and Mortar store! We weren't able to raise quite enough to do so last project, so hopefully this one there will be extra left over.
 Support
There are so many people who have supported my journey, my fiance Alex has been a huge help, he helped me keep calm and dice on!
Goblin Hoard on Facebook is an amazing friendly Dice Group that helps you figure out what you want to know in the dice world, they are one of my favourite groups for people who are open and frank.
One of my other favourite groups is Dice Maniacs. If you want to meet an amazing group of people you really need to check them out.
You are amazing! Simply put I appreciate everyone who backs this Kickstarter and everyone who helped me along the way.
Thank you!
Colette Chappell
Owner of Little Dragon Corp

campaign.story:
You are Cute. You are Cunning. You are Fierce. You are Magical Kitties, and it’s time to Save the Day!
Every Magical Kitty has a human. Every human has a Problem. In Magical Kitties Save the Day, you need to use your magical powers to solve problems and save the day!
But kitties live in Hometowns that are filled with Troubles like witches, aliens, and hyper-intelligent raccoons. Troubles make Problems worse, so the kitties need to go on adventures to take care of the Troubles before that can happen.
Magical Kitties Save the Day is a roleplaying game designed for all-ages. Older players — whether they’re parents, babysitters, teachers, or older siblings — can be the Game Master for kids as young as six-years-old and everyone else who loves kitties. If you’ve been looking for a way to introduce your friends and family to roleplaying games, Magical Kitties is the perfect game to do it!
You’ve never played a roleplaying game, either? Purr-fect! Magical Kitties includes a lot of tools — including a solo play module so that you can start playing within moments of opening the box! — and guidance for both first-time roleplayers and first-time GMs. Whether you’ve played board games with roleplaying elements like Mice & Mystics or T.I.M.E. Stories, watched actual play videos, or just think roleplaying games sound like a lot of fun and you want to give them a try, Magical Kitties can be your first step into a larger world.


Make Magical Kitties a rock star on social media and help people discover the amazing world of roleplaying games! When we reach ANY of the milestones listed above, we'll unlock the next Social Stretch Goal. We've already unlocked upgraded character sheets and a digital wallpaper pack for all backers! Go here for detailed instructions on how you can join the team!
The $25 STANDARD EDITION is the version of Magical Kitties Save the Day you’ll find in retail stores next year. It includes everything you need to play the game. 
The $50 DELUXE EDITION is packed full of high quality component upgrades (wooden tokens, custom dice) and a bunch of bonus content, including the Power Cards. Most of the physical rewards from stretch goals unlocked during the Kickstarter campaign will be exclusive to the Kickstarter Kitties receiving the Deluxe Edition.

Playing Magical Kitties is easy. When your kitty is trying to do something difficult, you’ll build a pool of six-sided dice with:
A number of dice equal to the attribute you’re using (Cute, Cunning, or Fierce)
An extra die if you’re using your Talent
Two extra dice if you’re using your Power
The Game Master sets a difficulty (a number from 3 to 6) and then you roll your dice pool. Each die that rolls equal to or higher than the difficulty is a success. The number of successes you rolled determines the outcome:
In Magical Kitties Save the Day, it’s not just a question of whether or not you succeed: It’s about how you succeed. The complications and bonuses generated by most outcomes will drive the action forward in unexpected and exciting ways! You and your friends will be discovering the story together!
The core story of Magical Kitties Save the Day is right in the name: You are magical kitties. You have humans. The humans have problems. You need to use your magical powers to solve their problems and save the day!
When you open your copy of Magical Kitties Save the Day, sitting right on top will be a copy of Magical Kitties & The Big Adventure, a solo-play graphic novel adventure illustrated by Garth Graham. This action-packed comic book is also a full scenario! Within moments of opening the box, you’ll be able to create your magical kitty and go on an amazing adventure that will also teach readers of all ages how to play the full game!
In Magical Kitties Save the Day, one player — known as the Game Master (GM) — has a very special role. They describe the world in which the magical kitties live to the other players and, when the kitties take action, they use the rules of the game to figure out what happens next. Magical Kitties also includes “Magical Kitties & The Game Master’s First Adventure.” Just as The Big Adventure will walk new players through how to play the game, “The Game Master’s First Adventure” will walk first-time Game Masters through how to run the game for their friends and family.
If you’re a roleplayer with years of experience, Magical Kitties makes it easy to introduce your friends and family your favorite hobby. But if you’ve never played a roleplaying game before, Magical Kitties Save the Day makes it easy to try something new! Between The Big Adventure, “The Game Master’s First Adventure,” and the Kitty Tips! you’ll find throughout every book, it’ll be like we’re right there by your side the whole time.
Tablestory purr-sents Magical Kitties Save the Day. For the first three Saturdays of the campaign (July 20th, July 27th, and August 3rd @ 4PM EDT) they'll be donning cat ears on their Twitch channel and playing a three-part adventure to save the day!

Matthew J. Hanson, the creator of Magical Kitties Save the Day, has written RPG material for Kobold Press, Green Ronin Publishing, Dragon and Dungeon Magazines, EN Publishing, Expeditious Retreat Press and more. He also runs a small publishing company called Sneak Attack Press which produces both licensed work, like the silver ENnie Award-winning Broken Earth setting, and original RPGs, like Abstract Dungeon. He lives in Minneapolis with his wife, two cats, and 18-month old son. His son's first word was, in fact, "kitty."
Justin Alexander is the RPG Producer at Atlas Games, responsible for the ongoing development of award-winning games like Feng Shui, Over the Edge, Unknown Armies, and Ars Magica. He is also the co-designer of the Infinity Roleplaying Game and the creator of the Alexandrian, for which he was just nominated for a 2019 ENnie Award.
Paul Dean is a writer. In addition to co-founding the board games site/show Shut Up & Sit Down and co-creating the latest edition of the Paranoia RPG, Paul has also contributed to or been featured in publications and outlets as diverse as The Telegraph, Eurogamer, IGN, How We Get to Next, The New Statesmen, The Guardian, RockPaperShotgun, and BBC Radio. (He’s even got a Cadbury’s Children’s Poetry Collection.) Later this year his scenario “We’ll Temporarily Have Paris” will appear in the Feng Shui 2 adventure anthology Have Fist, Will Travel.
Clio Yun-su Davis is a game designer and writer who creates larps, tabletop roleplaying games, interactive fiction games, and card games. Their freeform game The Long Drive Back from Busan won the Golden Cobra Challenge award for Best Game That Incorporates Meaningful, Non-Romantic Relationships in 2017, and their game about the future of ancestor worship, The Truth About Eternity, was presented at Fastaval 2019 in Denmark. http://www.cysdavis.com 
Jeremy Tuohy is the author of The Heist at Nimressa, a D&D adventure, and also “The Battle of the Bands,” an Over the Edge adventure appearing in the Welcome to the Island Anthology this fall.
Chris Costello is a freelance writer. As a former teacher, he loves using his expertise in the learning process to make games easy to learn and accessible for everyone. He has written supplements for Sneak Attack Press. He is a two-time Pinewood Derby State Champion.  
Anthony Cournoyer is part of the phenomenal Magical Kitties art team. He has previously illustrated the Raid & Trade board game. He can be found on Instagram as @sorrow_scavenger.
Ekaterina Kazartseva says, “Hi!” She’s mostly known as Pinguinlog. She’s been drawing since childhood and has been doing it professionally for the past six years. “Mostly I’m interested in drawing nature and animals. I think we can learn a lot from the world around us, so I like to explore it from different angles.” She’s also the happy owner of a Caique parrot, Arthur, and two precious cats, Kitty and Sassy, who give her constant inspiration and good reference for Magical Kitties.
Garth Graham was classically trained as an Industrial Designer, but he started his first webcomic back in college. Since then, he’s become an established freelance comic artist, foregoing all that higher education to tell stories with pictures. It’s kinda awesome. Mostly these days he draws StarPower, a super powered space adventure. You can visit him online at www.gcgstudios.com.
Jason Bradley Thompson's illustrations and maps have appeared in Dungeons  & Dragons, Call of Cthulhu and many other roleplaying games. He has also worked as a manga editor for Viz, co-designer of the tabletop games Cartooner and Mangaka, a DMsGuild content creator, a comics artist (HP Lovecraft's Dream-Quest of Unknown Kadath), and a story artist on Minions: The Rise of Gru. His map of Hot Springs Island is nominated for a 2019 ENnie Award for Best Cartography. He is currently working on a Dreamland tabletop RPG. Brigette Indelicato is a full-time graphic designer, art director, and creative consultant specializing in board game graphic design and logo design. Credits include War Chest, Star Trek: Galactic Enterprises, Dungeon Hustle, and Kibble Scuffle. She lives in Philadelphia with her husband and two orange cats, Dax and Odo, named after her favorite Star Trek characters. You can find her work at www.brigetteidesign.com or say hello on twitter at @brigetteidesign.

Atlas Games has been creating games for nearly three decades. We have launched, completed, and fulfilled four previous Kickstarter projects: Feng Shui 2, Unknown Armies 3, the third edition of Over the Edge, and the exciting card game Cogs & Commissars. While every project comes with its own special risks and demands, we’re confident that Magical Kitties Save the Day will be every bit as successful in its production and fulfillment as these other games.

Hello, Magical Kitties backers! I'm John Nephew, president of Atlas Games, and I'm popping in to give you an update on the logistics of Magical Kitties Save the Day. There's no big news...just details that some folks may find interesting as your games make their way into your paws.
The games were all done and at the port of Shanghai on November 6th. However, as we told in you in our last update, shipping traffic out of China is congested right now, to put it mildly. The container waited 19 days to set sail on the OOCL Canada, which departed Shanghai on November 25th and is now making its way across the Pacific Ocean to Prince Rupert, British Columbia, Canada.

The good news: Magical Kitties is printed, packed up in its container, and awaiting shipping to the US from Shanghai.
The bad news: We don't expect Magical Kitties to arrive in time for us to deliver it to you by the holidays.
We're very sorry to disappoint you, especially after the delays of earlier this year, but unfortunately, this setback is out of our hands. Here's what's going on.

campaign.story:
Hello friends,
My name is Josh and I play Dungeons & Dragons. My Dungeon Master, Jeremiah, and I came up with the idea of creating a book that has hundreds of cut-out pieces used to build more engaging encounters within our game. We started by drawing and printing trees, rocks, and a single house. These pieces made the encounters more interesting and made our game maps looks much better. We decided to see where we could go with this idea, so I called up my good friend Travis (a phenomenal artist) and asked if he could help us create a book. Travis jumped all over it and started sending us some amazing art. Jeremiah built a massive list of important items for Dungeon Masters to use and we slowly built the book Dungeon Craft. 
Dungeon Craft is the culmination of a lot of work by a few friends that truly believe it is a great tool for players and DMs alike. We wanted to make a book that was affordable to everyone while still being of great quality. Dungeon Craft is perfect for any D&D essential kit or collection. This book is beneficial for seasoned veterans, new players, young children, and everyone else who enjoys role-playing games. We have been play testing this book for some time and have sent it out into the world for DMs and players to "put it through its paces". After all the work and testing, we are ready to present it here to all of you. Thank you for your time and interest. I hope you enjoy our book.
Cheers,
Josh
Every backer who purchases a copy of Dungeon Craft will get all the terrain that is unlocked by hitting a stretch goal during the campaign.
With Dungeon Craft, we hope to offer the tools needed for any Dungeon Master, Game Master, and player to build an engaging world to play in. Our goal is to decrease the time spent drawing and increase the amount of time playing your favorite Table Top Role Playing Game. Simply cut out any of the 1,000+ terrain pieces that are in the book and place it on a map.
Each book contains a ton of reversible City, Dungeon, and Wilderness terrain pieces. We have also included hoards of creatures and a few extra pieces we just couldn't leave out.

Unlike 3D terrain, Dungeon Craft doesn't require much storage space. When you receive a copy of Dungeon Craft, all the terrain pieces come bound in a spiral book. Simply cut out the pieces you need. All the pieces can easily be stored in a binder. The whole book can fit neatly into any backpack for the on-the-go Dungeon Master.
Our goal creating this product was to make it available to everyone. We understand that this community has enough books that are $50+. Our belief in a quality product at a fair price is paramount. 
As everything gets more expensive, we wanted to carve out our own path. We have worked very hard to create a product that everyone can afford. That's why we are very proud to release this Dungeon Craft for $30.
PLAY

To bring this idea to life we had to find someone who had the ability to deliver quality art. Luckily we were able to work with two brothers who are fantastic artists. Travis and Jordan Kotzebue worked day and night in order to create all the assets for Dungeon Craft. As our community of D&D players thought of wild and crazy ideas, Travis would then piece together all the ideas and draw up a blue line for us.
If the blue line looked good, it was approved and moved to the next stage. Travis would then refine his work into a fully inked piece. The final step was coloring, where Jordan would bring the art to life.Working on this project, it was incredible to see our ideas being brought to life so masterfully.
PLAY

***All rewards that include Hell or High Water will ship in March 2020***
Also available in the Kickstarter is our “Hell or Highwater” companion books. These two companion books were made to be used with Wizards of the Coast's two newest books “Ghosts of Saltmarsh” and “Baldur's Gate Descent into Avernus” 
“Hell” is our companion book for Descent into Avernus and contains numerous hellscape terrain pieces that allow you to craft and shape your battle maps to look like the first layer of hell. Included in this book will be all new terrain and creature pieces straight out of the river Styx, all of it there to bring your journey into hell to life.

“Highwater” is our companion book for Ghosts of Saltmarsh. Included in this book is a large collection of creatures, ships and more. Each piece is chosen to help you run the adventures in Ghosts of Saltmarsh and any other seafaring adventure you choose to have.
 ***All rewards that include Hell or High Water will ship in March 2020***
We made sure that our product worked with all types of grid mats on the market today. Every terrain piece has a 1 inch grid over it so you can place it onto any mat. For those going for that perfect aesthetic feel, we've created our own wet erase maps that use the same colors and textures as the backgrounds of our terrain. This allows any piece you place on the map to blend right in and look seamless. Right now we're in the prototype stage of creation, but we plan to launch the maps shortly after our kickstarter ends so keep your eyes peeled and follow us on social media for updates or news.
*The map below is an early test mock-up. The final will match perfectly.*
We've partnered with the amazing folks over at LEVEL UP DICE to bring you the Dungeon Craft D20. An aluminum D20 using our own custom font and a mixture of colors never used by Level Up Dice before. This exclusive D20 can only be found here on this Kickstarter. When the Kickstarter campaign is over they're gone forever.

Agatha, the coven's Supreme Witch for the last 166 years has gone missing. Where did that old hag run off to now? No one knows. One thing is clear, her title is up for grabs... The time has come to fight for it! It won’t be an easy task, though: you’ll have to muster all of your power to face the rest of those competing harpies. The battle has begun, and only one shall rise as the new Supreme Witch! 
Bitchy Witches is a fast-paced, competitive game you can take anywhere and in which strategy plays a decisive role. 3 to 4 players can play as a group of devious witches fighting among themselves to become the next Supreme Witch.     
"Be the witch” reward
Want to enjoy a tailored game experience? This reward will turn you into a witch or wizard. Choose one of the four Arcane Inheritances and we’ll make a card for you. You can play with your custom card instead of the game's witches. Only you will receive this card, it will not be included in the basic game. 
 We have loads of ideas and enthusiasm to upgrade the basic game. If we manage to reach the campaign goal, we have several upgrades and add-ons planned, and we hope that you like them and that we can release them. 
Those marked as "Included in all pledges"will be included for free for all of you who buy the game.
The ones labeled "Kickstarter exclusive" will only be available for purchase through this campaign or, for the unsold copies, on any events we go to in person.
Based on our previous experience, shipping costs will be paid after the Kickstarter is finalized in our pledge manager at the end of the campaign. That way, depending on the volume of your package, we’ll be able to offer the cheapest shipping costs.
The estimated costs are as follows:
 USA: 8€ - 14€
 Europe: 6€ - 10€
 Spain: 3€
 Other countries: 10€ - 24€
This is our second Kickstarter after the successful Killer Eyelashes campaign. We are a small team working hard to make our projects come true, we hope you like them and thank you for contributing to make them a reality!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our second Kickstarter after the success of Killer Eyelashes. We've learned a lot about manufacturing, shipping and how to optimize costs the best we can to make it reach everyone affordably.

Our game is almost finished. We want to edit it with the best possible quality and for that we have created some stretch goals. The money will be almost entirely to pay for the manufacture of the game and the costs of taxes, commissions and extra translation work.

After Kickstarter we will provide everyone with a pledge manager to receive your delivery address and applicable shipping costs. 

With a new game we have new challenges, but we are very capable of carrying them out.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: This is not the end of the Witching Hour...
updates.update_content:
Hi friends,
Thank you very much to all of you who have supported us. Unfortunately this time we couldn't make it. The coven will continue fighting until a New Supreme witch appears. But not everything is lost!
We will continue to perfect our spells and potions to make them stronger and make Bitchy Witches a reality.

The coven has been called but the new supreme has not yet arisen.
Thanks to your help we have achieved a 35% but we need the help of all witches and warlocks you know to reach the goal.
We still have a few days before the campaign ends but we need everyone's support to achieve it. Spread the magic words among your friends and spirits.

The path to become the New Supreme
 it's not as easy as it may seem.
 Witches spells and evil hexes
 will try to dispel your defenses.
 Spirits and artifacts under your power
 will give you the victory in this quarrel.
Today we are going to talk about the strange artifacts and their powers. Each of these artifacts are linked to an arcane inheritance and to use them you have to be of this inheritance or have a spirit of the heritance summoned under your control.
